summary: The MiG-21 is a fast plane used for fighting and stopping enemies in the sky. It was made in Russia a long time ago and is known by many names, like "Balalaika" and "Silver Swallow." Over 60 countries have used it, and it's still flying today, which is very impressive! It's the most-made supersonic jet and combat aircraft, and it holds records for being in production the longest.
title: Mikoyan-Gurevich MiG-21
